name: 蘇春��
objective: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
schedule:
week 1: Determinants
week 2: Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
week 3: Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
week 4: Systems of Linear Differential Equations
week 5: Systems of Linear Differential Equations
week 6: Vector Differential Calculus
week 7: Vector Differential Calculus
week 8: Vector Integral Calculus
week 9: Midterm Exam
week 10: Vector Integral Calculus
week 11: Fourier Series
week 12: Fourier Series
week 13: Fourier Integral and Fourier Transforms
week 14: Fourier Integral and Fourier Transforms
week 15: Wave Equation
week 16: Wave Equation
week 17: Geometry and Arithmetic of Complex Numbers
week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. 出席
2. 作業
3. 小考
4. 期中考
5. 期末考
materials: 教科書: ”Advanced Engineering Mathematics”, Peter V. O'Neil, THOMSON, 2007
